content:
Welcome to Urban Outlast, where survival is the only option! In this action-packed 2D battle royale, you are dropped into a vibrant yet perilous island city. Scavenge for resources, equip yourself with weapons and armor, and craft strategic tools to adapt to the ever-shifting battlefield. Outsmart your rivals, make bold moves, and fight to outlast everyone.
Will you be the final survivor in Urban Outlast? The challenge awaitsâ€”step into the arena and prove your worth!
Download
Made as software engineering project. With 3 roommates.
summary: Welcome to Urban Outlast, where survival is the only option!
title: Urban Outlast

content:
As a new commander, the only way you can communicate with your naval fleet is the flag in your hand. Move your arms and destroy your enemy!
Download
Made in Future Jam,72 hours. With 1 programer and 1 artist.
summary: As a new commander, the only way you can communicate with your naval fleet is the flag in your hand.
title: Flag Sea War

content:
Build your army like using crafting table and control information your enemy get.
Download
Indie game,deprecated after test,leading to a new game.
summary: Build your army like using crafting table and control information your enemy get.
title: Multiplayer Card Warchess

content:
Cats want to be touched,they occupied your keyboard!
Satisfy cute cats,and try not to be scratched!
Download
Made in 2023 CiGA Game Jam,by a group with 7 members.
summary: Cats want to be touched,they occupied your keyboard!
title: Raining Cat

content:
Moonlight Connection is a puzzle game centered around light interaction. Utilize the magical illumination brought by moonlight fragments and, together with your companions, defeat shadowy monsters on the journey ahead.
Uncover the truth behind the power of moonlight.
Download
Made in 2023 Future Jam,by a group with 6 members.
summary: Moonlight Connection is a puzzle game centered around light interaction.
title: Moonlight Connection

content:
In this game,you will control wind and root to help little tumbleweed find home.
Crack the solid,root beside water,rolling in the wind!
Download
Made in 2023 Global Game Jam,by a group with 7 members.
summary: In this game,you will control wind and root to help little tumbleweed find home.
title: Rolling in the wind

content:
You, who have mistakenly entered the Gothic castle, are astonished to discover that the mechanisms here respond to your heartbeat!
Puzzles and life itself are tied to your heartbeat. Escape to survive using your pounding heart.
Download
Made in 2023 UGDAP developing course,by a group with 6 members.
summary: You, who have mistakenly entered the Gothic castle, are astonished to discover that the mechanisms here respond to your heartbeat!
title: Gothic Pulse

content:
Defeat enemies with props in the scene of slashing and flying… or be overwhelmed by them using props!
Download
Indie game,as course homework.
summary: Defeat enemies with props in the scene of slashing and flying… or be overwhelmed by them using props!
title: Forigin
